content: * basic granny square this pattern can be used for making little squares or larger ones simply continue the pattern for as many rounds as desired to sew together for blankets cushion covers shawls or scarves use any number of colours in any number of combinations materials yarn crochet hook to match yarn gauge is not important for this pattern darning needle abbreviations chain chain stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet * * repeat instructions between asterisks as many times as directed pattern us terminology start make slip knot on hook with yarn chain 4 join with slip_stitch to first chain to form ring round 1 chain 2 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in centre of ring chain 2 to make corner *3 double_crochet in centre of ring chain 2* repeat 2 more times slip_stitch to top of chain 2 tie off turn work prevents each corner of square from pulling left so no blocking of work is needed at the end round 2 with slip_stitch attach yarn to any corner space chain 2 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same space *chain 2 3 double_crochet in same space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next space* repeat 2 more times chain 2 3 double_crochet in same space chain 1 slip_stitch to top of chain 2 tie off turn work round 3 with slip_stitch attach yarn to any corner space chain 2 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same space *chain 2 3 double_crochet in same space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next space* repeat 2 more times chain 2 3 double_crochet in same space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next space chain 1 slip_stitch to top of chain 2 tie off turn work round 4 with slip_stitch attach yarn to any corner space chain 2 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same space *chain 2 3 double_crochet in same space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next space* repeat 2 more times chain 2 3 double_crochet in same space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next space chain 1 3 double_crochet in next space chain 1 slip_stitch to top of chain 2 tie off and weave in all ends * this is my pattern for a granny square others may have slight variations in some of the steps but the final product usually works out the same
